# Divide (/)

This function divides 2 number expressions. The result is a number.

<colgroup>

<li>Field reference</li>
<li>Function</li>
</ul></td>
</tr>
<tr class="even">

<td class="confluenceTd"><p>Divisor</p>
<p>Possible children:</p>
<ul>
<li>Data Constant</li>
<li>Field reference</li>
<li>Function</li>
</ul></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
